fields.title: StoryBooks
fields.description: StoryBooks is a CRUD apps for writing a list of story or blog-post, you can create your own story in 'public' or 'private', if you choose your story in private, your private story wouldn't show up in Public Stories

fields.title: Shopping cart
fields.description: A mini e-commerce web, that show how to take an order in a basket. I'm using local-storage DOM for keep the order on the basket with a list of product taken from JSON.

fields.title: Car Dealer
fields.description: A e-commerce web. with lazy-loading when you hit first the web.
